channel.title: Desolace | Most Advanced 317 | EXTREME CONTENT | 24 Skills
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://desolace.net/forum/Themes/lagusta_20rc5/images/custom/logo.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.desolace.net/]Website [/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.desolace.net/"]Forum[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.desolace.net/play"]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.desolace.net/download"]Download[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://desolace.net/index/vote.php"]Vote[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.desolace.net/highscores/"]Highscores[/URL]
[B]Hello and welcome to Desolace! Desolace is a server that has been worked on since 2011! A amazing server coded by Samy and Gabbe that gives the player the best experience possible for a 317 of this kind. We have a very friendly community and a playerbase rapidly growing! Since the project has been worked on for over 3 years you can bet we have almost everything you could want in a runescape private server. So why not come and try it out yourself. We welcome everyone to come join the thrill and experience of Desolace. We also offer Highscores for players to compete with each other and fight for the number 1 spots! So come and experience something unique and fun at Desolace today![/B]
[SIZE=5][B]Features:[/B][/SIZE] - 24 Trainable Skills - Professional Website - Amazing Staff - Great Playerbase in the making! - Friendly Community - Stable Uptime - [B]Team Dungeoneering[/B] - HD Textures - Full screen/Resizable - 100% Clan Chat - Dungeoneering - Summoning - Hunter - Nex - Corperal Beast - God Wars - Slash Bash (Boss) - Recipe for Diaster (Mini Quest) - Nomads Requiem (Mini Quest) - Conquest Arena (Mini Game) - Fishing Trawler - Soul Wars - Tons of Achievements - Quick Prayers - Emoji's :)
Note: This is not all the features Desolace has to offer. Login in-game to discover more.
[SIZE=5][B]Media:[/B][/SIZE] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/9DbQTAu.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/2VeHo5I.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/9mjPqLy.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/46a0a7f79c2ce24716c981b6f67006ad.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/bQcSwML.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/c3a28feffb7515282e8e1ce9a1d13231.png[/img] [img]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/cfdea259022ebbda9806d8917579efb2.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/f38EBGB.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/ncZHOh4.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/OkfDnSC.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/qX22cTZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/u8Hy0ZV.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/WTKUEhN.png[/img] [IMG]http://desolace.net/index/slider/images/yfVKQO9.png[/img]

item.title: Desolace | Most Advanced 317 | EXTREME CONTENT | 24 Skills
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Short solution to all this bullshit, turn the server off hit each other with a frying pan and smile.

Now being honest…
This server could’ve had potential, but the name changes etc give me strange feelings.
Also reading the stuff about Insanityx owner etc, isn’t making me excited to join at all.
I know there can be problems around a server, but keep it away from your adverisement.

It’s making the server look less professional, and eventually doesn’t bring you where you want to be.

Read full topic
item.source: Desolace | Most Advanced 317 | EXTREME CONTENT | 24 Skills

item.title: Desolace | Most Advanced 317 | EXTREME CONTENT | 24 Skills
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[quote=“Shane, post:10, topic:545930”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=664820.msg4444369#msg4444369 date=1408036684]

i thought desolace was done and its atolic now ?

They closed Desolace and made it Atiloc. Then they closed Atiloc and made it Desolace. Lol.

The same thing but different name? https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663776.0.html
But I loved it when I played it though!

Basically I don’t know the reasoning behind it. Updates are coming though so its going to be fairly different with a week or so.

You must be the server owner to post a server here.
[/quote]

Well I guess I’m a owner then.

@ColdMedicine :palm: :palm: :palm: retarded af aren’t you. Don’t try and say something about something you have no idea about…

InsanityX is complete shit. Only if you were to see whats inside of Desolace. Also Ace is the one who fudgeed Gabbe over you idiot. He began to sell it then he publicly released it. Oh if I remember right I’m pretty sure Ace paid YOU to fudge Gabbe and Samy over…[/quote]

cool cool.

all hostility aside you guys using the same base I haven’t gotten a chance to get on it for quite some time now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Horrible server.

Not only is the owner completely acting like a kid, and so is the co-owner for that matter…
The server is filled of bugs, and immature actions.

They are pretty much a wannabe InsanityX.

(I’m the old forums owner untill i heard Gabriel (their owner) screwed over Ace (InsanityX’s owner) and decided to take my work from them and quit.)
